quote: The greatest treasures are those invisible to the eye but found by the heart. – Judy Garland
fact: The average talker sprays about 300 microscopic saliva droplets per minute, about 2.5 droplets per word.
joke: I'd like to start a diet, but I've got too much on my plate right now.
